alert.note: Alert for Bakersfield; Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5; Delano-Wasco-Shafter; South End San Joaquin Valley; Southeast San Joaquin Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued February 24 at 9:54AM PST until February 24 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of central California, including the following areas, Bakersfield, Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5, Delano-Wasco-Shafter, South End San Joaquin Valley and Southeast San Joaquin Valley. * WHEN...Through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Storm drains and ditches may become clogged with debris. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Bakersfield; Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5; Delano-Wasco-Shafter; South End San Joaquin Valley; Southeast San Joaquin Valley
